local screenW, screenH = guiGetScreenSize()
local PosBG = 0.9999 -- startPos do BG = 0.8109
local PosRectangle = 0.9630 -- startPos do Rec = 0.8109
local PosText = 1.1
local startTime = getTickCount()
 
function isMouseInPosition( x, y, width, height )
    if ( not isCursorShowing( ) ) then
        return false
    end
    local sx, sy = guiGetScreenSize ( )
    local cx, cy = getCursorPosition ( )
    local cx, cy = ( cx * sx ), ( cy * sy )
    if ( cx >= x and cx <= x + width ) and ( cy >= y and cy <= y + height ) then
        return true
    else
        return false
    end
end
 
function dxDrawMyInteriorGui()
    local progress = (getTickCount() - startTime) / 1000
    PosBG, PosRectangle, PosText = interpolateBetween(screenW * 0.9999, screenW * 0.9630, screenW * 1.1,screenW * 0.8109,screenW * 0.8109,screenW * 0.8600, progress, "Linear")
    if isGuiShow == false then
        PosBG, PosRectangle, PosText = interpolateBetween(screenW * 0.8109, screenW * 0.8109, screenW * 0.8600,screenW * 0.9999,screenW * 0.9630,screenW * 1.1, progress, "OutBack")
    end
    dxDrawRectangle(PosBG, screenH * 0.3145, 363, 438, tocolor(20, 20, 20, 255), false) --BackGround
    RecRed = dxDrawRectangle(PosRectangle, screenH * 0.3150, screenW * 0.0396, screenH * 0.0676, tocolor(215, 20, 0, 255), false) -- Red
    dxDrawRectangle(PosRectangle, screenH * 0.3815, screenW * 0.0396, screenH * 0.0676, tocolor(18, 196, 22, 255), true) --Green
    dxDrawRectangle(PosRectangle, screenH * 0.4491, screenW * 0.0396, screenH * 0.0676, tocolor(14, 145, 199, 255), true) -- Blue1
    dxDrawRectangle(PosRectangle, screenH * 0.5167, screenW * 0.0396, screenH * 0.0676, tocolor(187, 25, 174, 255), true) -- purple
    dxDrawRectangle(PosRectangle, screenH * 0.5843, screenW * 0.0396, screenH * 0.0676, tocolor(29, 182, 169, 255), true) -- Blue 2
    dxDrawRectangle(PosRectangle, screenH * 0.6519, screenW * 0.0396, screenH * 0.0676, tocolor(19, 0, 210, 255), true) -- Blue 3
    dxDrawText("Dodaj nowe pitro", PosText, screenH * 0.3130, screenW * 1.0000, screenH * 0.3815, tocolor(255, 255, 255, 255), 1.50, "default", "center", "center", false, false, false, false, false)
    dxDrawText("Dodaj nowe pitro2", PosText, screenH * 0.3806, screenW * 1.0000, screenH * 0.4491, tocolor(255, 255, 255, 255), 1.50, "default", "center", "center", false, false, false, false, false)
    dxDrawText("Dodaj nowe pitro3", PosText, screenH * 0.4481, screenW * 1.0005, screenH * 0.5167, tocolor(255, 255, 255, 255), 1.50, "default", "center", "center", false, false, false, false, false)
    dxDrawText("Dodaj nowe pitro4", PosText, screenH * 0.5157, screenW * 1.0000, screenH * 0.5843, tocolor(255, 255, 255, 255), 1.50, "default", "center", "center", false, false, false, false, false)
    dxDrawText("Dodaj nowe pitro5", PosText, screenH * 0.5843, screenW * 1.0005, screenH * 0.6528, tocolor(255, 255, 255, 255), 1.50, "default", "center", "center", false, false, false, false, false)
    dxDrawText("Dodaj nowe pitro6", PosText, screenH * 0.6519, screenW * 1.0005, screenH * 0.7204, tocolor(255, 255, 255, 255), 1.50, "default", "center", "center", false, false, false, false, false)
end
 
addEventHandler('onClientClick', root, function(btn, state)
    if btn == 'left' and state == 'down' then
        if isMouseInPosition(screenW * 0.8109, screenH * 0.3150, screenW * 0.0396, screenH * 0.0676) then
            outputChatBox('dziaa')
        end
    end
end)
 
function startMyInterior()
    if isGuiShow == false then
        startTime = getTickCount()
        addEventHandler("onClientRender", root, dxDrawMyInteriorGui)
        isGuiShow = true
    else
        startTime = getTickCount()
        isGuiShow = false
    end
end
addCommandHandler("myint", startMyInterior)
